title: Kerry Katona says Katie Price's mucky mansion was so disgusting it gave her anxiety

Kerry Katona admitted her pal's home gave her anxiety because it was so messy.

She confessed that in comparison, her own home felt like a "bloody palace", after former glamour model Katie, 41, recently shared insight into how mucky the mansion was before clearing it out in a dramatic makeover.

Former Atomic Kitten singer Kerry unveiled the truth about Katie's dirty house as she wrote in her new! magazine column.

"Seeing Katie Price's mucky mansion made me realise I live in a bloody palace!

"You know I love Kate, but looking at all that stuff all over the floor in different rooms gave me anxiety!

(Image: Getty Images)

"Kate's like me - she's given a lot of free things and it is tricky to know what to do with it all.

"I don't envy her having to sort through that lot!"

(Image: Katie Price/Youtube)

(Image: Katie Price/Youtube)

Reality star Katie gave her mucky mansion a clean last week in hope to transform it into a wedding venue.

It was so bad that son Junior, 14, allegedly refused to stay at his mum's house because he was embarrassed.

The teenager prefers to live with his dad Peter Andre in his spotless house.

Kerry and Katie are best pals again now, but they've had a few rough patches.

(Image: Katie Price/Youtube)

After meeting on I'm A Celebrity in 2004, Kerry was a bridesmaid at Katie and Peter Andre's wedding.

They fell out in 2007, but last year rekindled their friendship.

But rumours formed that the pair fell out again after Kerry wrote about Katie's face following her botched cosmetic surgery.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Kerry penned in her new! column that her friend had "awful" wounds and "weird" ears.

But the girls dismissed the rumours a couple of days later as they reunited for a Friday night catch-up.

In an Instagram video, Katie joked: "I'm sick to death of you stabbing me in the back. How much surgery have you had?"

(Image: Instagram)

Kerry answers back: "Well only because I want to look like you, I just copy you."

Katie replies: "I can get you a discount!"
description: She claimed that Katie's filthy mansion is so messy compared to hers
